price: 55. «  Donne-moi la charge de l’intendance du pays, (dit Joseph), j’en serai le gardien en toute connaissance. »
arabic: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
